price: 208. Kuwa (Xaqa) rumeeyoow! U soo gala Islaamka si dhan waaxid iyo wadarba, hana raacina tallaabooyinka Shaydaanka. Hubaal! Wuxuu idiin yahay cadow cad.
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ ٱدۡخُلُواْ فِي ٱلسِّلۡمِ كَآفَّةٗ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ خُطُوَٰتِ ٱلشَّيۡطَٰنِۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَكُمۡ عَدُوّٞ مُّبِينٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū ud'khulū fī al-sil'mi kāffatan walā tattabiʿū khuṭuwāti al-shayṭāni innahu lakum ʿaduwwun mubīnun
